Class FlipFitGymCustomerRestController

java.lang.Object
com.flipfit.rest.FlipFitGymCustomerRestController
@Path("/customer-menu") @Produces("application/json") public class FlipFitGymCustomerRestController extends Object
This class provides REST API endpoints for managing the gym customer's operations. It offers endpoints to create a profile, view bookings, view gym centers, book slots, cancel bookings, and edit the customer profile.

  • Method Details

    • stringtodate

      public Date stringtodate(String dat)
      Converts a date string (dd/MM/yyyy) into a Date object.
      Parameters:
      dat - The date string to convert.
      Returns:
      The corresponding Date object, or null if the parsing fails.

    • createProfile

      @POST @Path("/createProfile") @Consumes("application/x-www-form-urlencoded") public String createProfile(@FormParam("name") String name, @FormParam("email") String email, @FormParam("address") String address, @FormParam("password") String password, @FormParam("contact") String contact)
      Creates a new gym customer profile.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the customer
      email - the email address of the customer
      address - the address of the customer
      password - the password for the customer account
      contact - the contact number of the customer
      Returns:
      a success message if the profile is created, otherwise an error message

    • viewBookings

      @GET @Path("/{customerId}/viewBookings") public List<GymBooking> viewBookings(@PathParam("customerId") Integer customerId)
      Endpoint to view all bookings made by a customer.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer whose bookings are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of GymBooking objects representing the bookings made by the customer.

    • viewCenters

      @GET @Path("/viewcenters") public List<GymCenter> viewCenters()
      Endpoint to view all available gym centers.
      Returns:
      A list of GymCenter objects representing all gym centers.

    • viewSlots

      @GET @Path("/{centerId}/viewslots") public List<GymSlots> viewSlots(@PathParam("centerId") Integer centerId, String date)
      Endpoint to view available slots for a specific gym center on a specific date.
      Parameters:
      centerId - The ID of the gym center.
      date - The date for which slots are to be viewed.
      Returns:
      A list of GymSlots objects representing the available slots at the center.

    • bookaslot

      @POST @Path("/{slotid}/bookaslot") public String bookaslot(@QueryParam("custId") Integer custId, @QueryParam("centerId") Integer centerId, @QueryParam("date") String date, @PathParam("slotid") Integer slotid)
      Endpoint to book a slot for a customer at a specific gym center.
      Parameters:
      custId - The ID of the customer making the booking.
      centerId - The ID of the gym center.
      date - The date of the booking.
      slotid - The ID of the slot to book.
      Returns:
      A confirmation message with the booking ID.

    • cancelBooking

      @DELETE @Path("/{bookingid}/{custid}/cancelbooking") public String cancelBooking(@PathParam("bookingid") Integer bookingid, @PathParam("custid") Integer custid)
      Endpoint to cancel an existing booking made by a customer.
      Parameters:
      bookingid - The ID of the booking to cancel.
      custid - The ID of the customer who made the booking.
      Returns:
      A message indicating the success or failure of the cancellation.

    • editprofile

      @PUT @Path("/editprofile") public String editprofile(@FormParam("name") String name, @FormParam("email") String email, @FormParam("address") String address, @FormParam("pwd") String pwd, @FormParam("contact") String contact, @FormParam("custId") Integer custId)
      Endpoint to edit a customer's profile information.
      Parameters:
      name - The updated name of the customer.
      email - The updated email address of the customer.
      address - The updated address of the customer.
      pwd - The updated password for the customer's account.
      contact - The updated contact number of the customer.
      custId - The ID of the customer whose profile is to be updated.
      Returns:
      A success or failure message indicating whether the profile was edited successfully.
